title: Power - relation between work and power

content.question: At time <math alttext="t sub 1" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>t</mi> <mn>1</mn> </msub> </math>, how much work has the motor done on the block?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator A t sub 1, and denominator t sub 1, end sub, plus B, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>A</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator A, and denominator, open parenthesis, t sub 1, end sub, plus B, close parenthesis, squared, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>A</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="A times the natural log of, open parenthesis, t sub 1 plus B, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>A</mi><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="A times the natural log of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator t sub 1, end sub, plus B, and denominator B, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>A</mi><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>B</mi></mrow><mi>B</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="A times the natural log of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator t sub 1, end sub, plus B, and denominator B, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>A</mi><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>B</mi></mrow><mi>B</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
